title: League free skins.
body: I did everything my friends told me to do to get the free skins that riot offers. Followed the twitter, subscribed the youtube channel and liked the facebook page and I couldn't get any of those skins. I need some help.

replies.body: If those methods of getting the free skins aren't working, go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to get that fixed right up!
